page.title: 02OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is in Carlton Miniott. There is an old building and a new building. Class 3 and 4 (the infants) are in the old building. You start in class 4 and move up to class 3,then you move up to the new building,you then go into class 2,then you go into class 1 which is the top class. I am in class 1.Some people walk to school and some ride.The people from Sandhutton come on the bus.I come from Sandhutton.We wait at the bus stop till the bus comes .Sometimes it is late. School starts at 8.50a.m. and finishes at3.30p.m.We go to school Monday to Friday.On Thursday we go swimming, and on Friday we can bring our roller boots.
